hibernate-mapping.query: select new omis.boardhearing.report.BoardHearingSummary( boardHearing.id, boardHearing.hearingDate, 'Status', category.name, organization.name, analystName.lastName, analystName.middleName, analystName.firstName, 'Decision' ) from omis.hearinganalysis.domain.HearingAnalysis hearingAnalysis inner join hearingAnalysis.analyst analyst inner join analyst.boardMember boardMember inner join boardMember.staffAssignment staffAssignment inner join staffAssignment.staffMember staffMember inner join staffMember.name analystName right outer join hearingAnalysis.eligibility pE, omis.boardhearing.domain.BoardHearing boardHearing inner join boardHearing.location location inner join location.organization organization left outer join boardHearing.category category inner join boardHearing.paroleEligibility paroleEligibility inner join paroleEligibility.offender offender where offender = :offender and (pE = paroleEligibility or pE is null)

select new omis.boardhearing.report.BoardHearingSummary( boardHearing.id, boardHearing.hearingDate, 'Status', category.name, organization.name, analystName.lastName, analystName.middleName, analystName.firstName, 'Decision' ) from omis.hearinganalysis.domain.HearingAnalysis hearingAnalysis inner join hearingAnalysis.analyst analyst inner join analyst.boardMember boardMember inner join boardMember.staffAssignment staffAssignment inner join staffAssignment.staffMember staffMember inner join staffMember.name analystName right outer join hearingAnalysis.eligibility pE, omis.boardhearing.domain.BoardHearing boardHearing inner join boardHearing.location location inner join location.organization organization left outer join boardHearing.category category inner join boardHearing.paroleEligibility paroleEligibility where boardHearing = :boardHearing and (pE = paroleEligibility or pE is null)
